MSG_TEXT: And yet people are lining up in droves to buy that truck.  Your standards of beauty aren't as universal as you seem to believe.

Yep, have driven 3 of their models for a few hours at a time. But, I'm not buying one until range anxiety is gone. I do some long road trips driving 900 miles a day for two, three days in a row. No way I'm doubling the trip time just for fuel.
